channel.title: How do i get co ords under "run energy" on your server
channel.description: how do i get co ords under "run energy" on your server ples help

item.title: How do i get co ords under "run energy" on your server
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:2, topic:145733”]Just type on your server:

::coordson

to turn off:

::coordsoff

There[/quote]

Music I’m afraid your wrong!

Most servers don’t have that and you could just add a command name ::mypos like the one i posted below:

if (command.startsWith("mypos")) { sendMessage("You are standing on X="+absX+" Y="+absY+" Your Height="+heightLevel); sendMessage("CurrentX: "+currentX+" CurrentY: "+currentY); }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get co ords under "run energy" on your server
